public org.springframework.web.context.request.async.DeferredResult<java.lang.String> writeVoltageAnalogOut(@RequestParam(value="output",required=true)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="voltage",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               int voltage)
        Sample usage: curl "http://localhost:8080/ioService/writeVoltageAnalogOut?&output=0&voltage=124"
        Parameters:
        output - number 0-3
        voltage/100 - in V 0-1023. 1023 equals 10.23 V
        Returns:
        response message
